title: Bug 108822 - More efficient logic needed for disk sorting with border values
EB: Implement more efficient logic to process disk sorting when there are border values for row values. Specifically, sort the data directly in memory and then write it to the file.
SR:
1. Copy the file to the destination folder. 
2. Run the sorting process with border values for row values. 
3. Observe the new sorting logic's behavior and compare it with the previous logic.
